name: Pixel Jumper
description:
Pixel Jumper is just a small game - platformer, but you can play it infinitely. At first, it was supposed to be for Android phones, but because i have some problems with Unity, it'll be for Windows. 

Controls:
W - Jump (can be used on walls)
A - Left
D - Right
S - "Fast fall"

E - Special ability (Cooldown for the ability is next to "!" button)
Q - Enlarge the field of view (Useful when you can't see next blocks and next block is too high for you)
